sections.paragraph: to meet, to encounter, to approach, to be opportune
a) (Piel) to allow to meet, to cause to meet
b) (Pual) to be sent, to be allowed to meet
(Hithpael) to seek occasion (quarrel), to cause oneself to meet

ஆங்கில மூலம் / Original in English: A primitive root (perhaps rather identical with H578 through the idea of contraction in anguish); to approach; hence to meet in various senses: - befall, deliver, happen, seek a quarrel.
Cognate: H579, H8385
